collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, or use our services. Our legal basis for processing this information includes your consent, performance of our contract with you, and our legitimate interests in providing and improving our services.
items: Personal information (name, email address, phone number, age, gender)
Profile information (photos, dining preferences, dietary restrictions, location)
Usage data (app interactions, features used, dining history, chat messages)
Device information (device type, operating system, IP address, unique identifiers)
Location data (GPS coordinates, check-in locations, dining venues)
Communications data (messages, support inquiries, feedback)

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We process your personal information for the following purposes based on legitimate interests, contractual necessity, or your consent:
items: Provide and operate our social dining matching services
Create and maintain your user profile and account
Facilitate connections between users for dining experiences
Send notifications about dining matches, messages, and platform updates
Personalize your experience and improve our recommendation algorithms
Analyze usage patterns to enhance platform functionality and safety
Process payments and manage billing (through third-party processors)
Comply with legal obligations and resolve disputes
Prevent fraud, abuse, and ensure platform safety

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.description: We work with trusted third-party service providers to deliver our services. These providers are contractually bound to protect your information and use it only for specified purposes:
items: Supabase (database and authentication services) - Data hosting and user authentication
Google Maps API - Location services and venue information
Payment processors - Secure payment processing (we do not store payment card information)
Cloud storage providers - Secure storage of profile photos and other media
Analytics services - Usage analytics and performance monitoring (anonymized data only)
Customer support tools - To provide better customer service

legal.title: Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR)
legal.description: For users in the European Economic Area (EEA), UK, and Switzerland, we process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:
items: Consent: For marketing communications, location tracking, and optional features
Contract Performance: To provide our core dining matching services
Legitimate Interests: For platform security, fraud prevention, and service improvement
Legal Obligation: To comply with applicable laws and regulations
Vital Interests: To protect user safety in emergency situations

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
items: With other users as part of our social features (public profile information, dining preferences)
With service providers who assist us in operating our platform (under strict confidentiality agreements)
When required by law, legal process, or government request
To protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users
In connection with a business transfer, merger, or acquisition (with user notification)
With your explicit consent for specific purposes

security.title: Data Security
security.description: We implement industry-standard technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including encryption in transit and at rest, access controls, regular security audits, and employee training on data protection.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
items: Access: Request a copy of your personal data we hold
Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data ('right to be forgotten')
Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
Restriction: Limit how we process your personal data
Objection: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for consent-based processing
Non-discrimination: Not be discriminated against for exercising your rights
Opt-out of Sale: California residents can opt-out of personal information sales (we do not sell personal information)

exercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
exercise.description: To exercise any of your privacy rights, you can:
items: Contact us using the information provided in the 'Contact Us' section
Use the privacy settings and controls within the app
Send an email to our Data Protection Officer at privacy@fanyueshe.com
For California residents: Submit a request through our dedicated CCPA portal
We will respond to valid requests within 30 days (or as required by applicable law)

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and analyze usage patterns:
items: Essential cookies: Required for basic platform functionality
Performance cookies: Help us understand how users interact with our platform
Functional cookies: Enable enhanced features and personalization
Analytics cookies: Provide insights into usage patterns (anonymized)
You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings

crossBorder.title: International Data Transfers
crossBorder.description: Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, including Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) and adequacy decisions, to protect your data during international transfers.

compliance.title: Transparency and Compliance Framework
compliance.description: We have established a comprehensive transparency and compliance framework to ensure lawful and transparent data processing:
items: Tiered access control: Administrators can only access chat records in necessary cases such as report investigations
Audit logging: All administrator access activities are logged, including access time, accessor, and access reason
Data minimization principle: Only collect and process necessary data, regularly clean up unnecessary data
Transparency reporting: Regularly publish data processing statistics while protecting user privacy
User rights protection: Users can query their data access history and request data deletion or correction

investigation.title: Data Processing in Report Investigations
investigation.description: When we receive user reports or need to investigate violations, we process data according to the following principles:
items: Necessity principle: Only access chat records and data related to the report
Minimal scope: Only access specific conversations suspected of violations, not expanding the scope
Time limitation: Investigation access permissions are immediately revoked after completion
Record keeping: All investigation access is recorded in audit logs for supervisory review
Result notification: Investigation results are promptly communicated to relevant users
Data cleanup: Related data from resolved cases is cleaned up according to specified timeframes

retention.title: Data Retention Periods
retention.description: We set reasonable retention periods for different types of data:
items: Chat records: Normally stored long-term, accessible by authorized personnel during report investigations
Audit logs: Automatically cleaned after 90 days to ensure timely oversight
Report data: Related data from resolved cases is regularly cleaned after case closure
User accounts: Personal data is completely deleted within 30 days after user account deletion
Access records: Administrator access records are kept for 1 year for compliance auditing
Temporary data: Session and cache data is regularly auto-cleaned

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.description: Our services are not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we become aware that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it promptly. Parents or guardians who believe their child has provided personal information should contact us immediately.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through the app. Continued use of our services after such notification constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us. For GDPR-related inquiries, you may also contact your local data protection authority.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: FanYueShe is a social dining platform that connects people for shared meal experiences. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and FanYueShe. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities and Eligibility
responsibilities.description: By using our platform, you represent that you are at least 18 years old and agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and profile creation
Maintain the security of your account credentials and notify us of any unauthorized access
Respect other users and maintain appropriate, respectful behavior at all times
Follow all applicable local, national, and international laws and regulations
Not use the platform for illegal, harmful, or fraudulent activities
Respect others' privacy, personal information, and intellectual property rights
Take responsibility for your safety when meeting other users
Pay any fees associated with premium features or services in a timely manner

rules.title: Platform Rules and Prohibited Conduct
rules.description: To maintain a safe and enjoyable environment for all users, the following activities are strictly prohibited:
items: Harassment, bullying, threats, stalking, or discriminatory behavior based on race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, or other protected characteristics
Sharing inappropriate, offensive, sexually explicit, or illegal content
Impersonating others, creating fake profiles, or misrepresenting your identity
Commercial solicitation, advertising, or promotional activities without explicit permission
Violating others' intellectual property rights or posting copyrighted material without authorization
Attempting to circumvent security measures or accessing accounts without permission
Spamming, sending unsolicited messages, or engaging in abusive communication
Using the platform to facilitate illegal activities, including but not limited to drug sales or prostitution
Creating multiple accounts to evade restrictions or manipulate the platform
Interfering with the proper functioning of the platform or attempting to access non-public areas

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
cancellation.description: For dining events, reservations, and premium services:
items: Free cancellation of dining events up to 2 hours before the scheduled time
Cancellations within 2 hours of the event may result in penalties or fees
No-shows without prior notice may negatively impact your platform reputation score
Event hosts have the right to cancel events with at least 1 hour notice to participants
Premium subscription fees are non-refundable except as required by applicable law
Refunds for premium features will be processed within 5-10 business days
In case of platform technical issues preventing service use, prorated refunds may be provided
Users who violate terms of service forfeit the right to refunds

disclaimer.title: Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability
disclaimer.description: By using FanYueShe, you acknowledge and agree that:
items: We are not responsible for the quality, safety, or outcome of dining experiences or meetings arranged through our platform
Users meet and interact with other users at their own risk and discretion
We strongly recommend meeting in public places and taking appropriate safety precautions
Platform availability is subject to maintenance, updates, and technical limitations
We do not guarantee the accuracy of user-provided information or restaurant details
We reserve the right to suspend, terminate, or restrict accounts that violate our terms without prior notice
Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by applicable law
We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages
Third-party services integrated with our platform are subject to their own terms and conditions

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual.content: All content, features, and functionality on FanYueShe, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are owned by FanYueShe and protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. Users retain ownership of content they create but grant us a license to use such content in connection with providing our services.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. You may delete your account through the app settings. We may terminate or suspend your account immediately for violations of these terms, illegal activity, or harm to other users. Upon termination, your right to use the services ceases, and we may delete your account data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

governing.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governing.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China. For international users, disputes will be resolved according to the laws of your jurisdiction where not in conflict with Chinese law. Any legal proceedings will be conducted in English or the local language as appropriate.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes via email or in-app notification at least 30 days before they take effect. Continued use of the platform after the effective date constitutes acceptance of the modified terms. If you do not agree to the changes, you must stop using our services.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Any disputes arising from the use of our services will first be addressed through good-faith negotiations. If unresolved, disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration administered by recognized arbitration institutions in accordance with applicable laws. For EU residents, you may also contact the European Commission's Online Dispute Resolution platform.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.content: We are committed to making our platform accessible to users with disabilities. If you encounter accessibility barriers or need assistance, please contact our support team. We continuously work to improve our platform's accessibility in accordance with WCAG 2.1 guidelines.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about these terms, privacy concerns, or legal matters, please contact us. We will respond to inquiries within 48 hours during business days:

about.title: About 饭约社
about.subtitle: Find your perfect dining companion. Connecting food, sharing happiness.
about.description: 饭约社 is a platform focused on social dining, dedicated to helping people discover like-minded partners and enjoy food together. Whether you want to meet new friends, explore local cuisine, or organize an interesting gathering, 饭约社 can provide you with the perfect solution.
about.mission: We believe that sharing food is not just about satisfying taste buds, but also an important way to build relationships and spread warmth. Through our platform, you can easily find nearby dining activities or initiate your own food gatherings.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Frequently asked questions and user guides

items.question: How to publish a dinner?
items.answer: Click the publish dinner button on the homepage, fill in dinner details including time, location, participant limit, food preferences, etc., then submit for review.

items.question: How to join a dinner?
items.answer: Browse the dinner list on the discover page, click on interesting dinners to view details, then click the join button. The dinner creator will receive a notification.

items.question: Can I cancel a dinner I joined?
items.answer: Yes, but we recommend notifying 24 hours in advance. Frequent last-minute cancellations may affect your credit rating and limit future participation rights.

items.question: How to set food preferences?
items.answer: You can set your food preferences and restrictions on your profile page. The system will recommend more suitable dinners based on this information.

items.question: What safety measures are there?
items.answer: We recommend dining in public places, protecting personal privacy information, and contacting customer service immediately if there are any abnormal situations. The platform records user behavior to maintain community safety.

items.question: How to contact other users?
items.answer: After joining a dinner, you can communicate with other participants through the in-platform chat function to discuss dining arrangements and share food experiences.

items.question: What to do if my account is restricted?
items.answer: If your account is restricted due to multiple last-minute cancellations, please contact customer service to explain the situation. We will handle it based on specific circumstances.

items.question: How to delete my account?
items.answer: If you need to delete your account, please send an email to weishang99@gmail.com, and we will process your request within 7 working days.

safety.title: Safety Tips
tips: Choose public places for dining, avoid private residences
Don't reveal too much personal privacy information
Recommend informing friends of dining arrangements
Maintain rational consumption to avoid disputes
